name: Law Enforcement Assistance National Instant Criminal Background Check System
objective: To provide a system so that any Federal Firearm Licensee (FFL) could receive an immediate determination by telephone or by other electronic means, on whether receipt of a firearm and/or explosive by a prospective buyer would violate Federal or State laws.
applicant_types: Public nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)
categories: Law, Justice, and Legal Services - Law Enforcement Support
rules_regulations: Title 28, CFR, Part 25 National Instant Criminal Background Check System Regulation, Public Laws 103-159 Federal Regulations, NICS Brochure, Appeals Brochure, POC Manual and FFL Manual.
